TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProgrammableConnectivityClient extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Azure Programmable Connectivity (APC) provides a unified interface to the Network APIs of multiple Telecom Operators. Note that Operators may deprecate a Network API with less advance notice than the Azure standard, in which case APC will also deprecate that Network API.
